boss!

lock the door.

as the man saluted in confirmation,i started running towards my destination.

name: gagoze
normalized: damn it…

name: man
normalized: o-oi!
this way!
you're going backto your room!

name: anastasia
normalized: …fine.

normalized: hn…

normalized: but i'm not going back to my roomby way of your orders.

normalized: what happened here!?

you idiot.

with those orders, i headed for jean's office.
anastasia sat in silence as she lookedout through the metal lattice that coveredthe window.
she could see many different menrunning around as if confused.
it seemed they weren't quite sure wherethey were going.
in other words, they were searching forsomething.
she had seen nothing like thissince she had been taken prisoner here.
it seemed they were in a stateof emergency.
coming to that conclusion,anastasia looked to where the mangaurding her room was standing.

name: anastasia
normalized: …is something going on outside?
as she spoke she started walkingtowards the man.

name: man
normalized: i don't know.

normalized: has something happened?
as she asked, she started to quickenher steps.

fromhere on though, i'll act without yourorders.

normalized: when i was brought here, my weaponswere taken somewhere on this floor…
the keys would probably prove to be useful.
anastasia, the 'silver valkyrie' hadn'tbeen simply biding time as a prisoner.

she didn't know what was going on,but now the entire city was in a panic.

name: anastasia
normalized: now's my chance…!
an opportunity will always presentitself to those who do not give up.

normalized: looks like the coast is clear…

along with a few grenades.

name: daness

name: daness
normalized: it seems the amount of men on thesearch has gone down… no, perhapsthey're just spread wider and thinner now.
